snippet: Shagaf, an undefeated 3-year-old bay colt, was made the 2-1 morning-line favorite for Saturday’s Wood Memorial, New York’s steppingstone to the Kentucky Derby.
lead_paragraph: Shagaf, an undefeated 3-year-old bay colt, was made the 2-1 morning-line favorite for Saturday’s Wood Memorial, New York’s steppingstone to the Kentucky Derby.

headline.main: Shagaf Named Favorite for Wood Memorial
headline.print_headline: Shagaf Named Favorite for Wood Memorial
